Content: Chairman of Gem and Jewellery Authority Peshala Jayaratne says that all steps will be taken to develop the gem industry. He said this while launching a stream-lined process to issue permits for gem mines.The permits were issued on concessionary terms, considering it as a cottage industry. About 500 permits have been issued yesterday at the Bakamuna public market. It took place under the patronage of Chairman of the Gem nd Jewellery Authority Peshala Jayaratne. Speaking on the occasion, he said that a new identity card will be made available to the miners in the future.
